entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Thompson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:28 a.m. CDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 0.8Â°C

Temperature: 0.8°C

Visibility: 24 km

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow at times heavy this morning and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
